row.entry: serviced attempts execution when trying file-tab completion.
By default, serviced binary is available to all users.
Variables SERVICED_DM_BASESIZE and SERVICED_DM_THINPOOLDEV are not present in defaults of serviced configuration file.
Backup/Restore page indicates "Error undefined service is running" even after stopping all services.
Public endpoints always appear to be running.
HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) is missing from the HTTPS server.
If there are more than 10 configs defined in an application's template, you cannot edit its configs.
No validation on error messages on the interface text input for resource pools.
security: Cross-site scripting on the Resource Pool name
No input filtering on the "RAM Requested" text field.
No input filtering on the host text field for public endpoints.
Services are unstable and randomly terminated and restarted.
When adding an invalid or duplicate host, the error flare messages are displayed behind the Add Hosts window.
Cannot add a new pool via UI after having a failed attempt.
Upgrading to Go 1.7.3 fixes issues with crypto/tls and net/http.
Docker network bridge automatically remaps service IPs, then loses internal network sync.
WAN outage causes collector services to shut down.
The Resource Pools page generates too many requests and causes serviced CPU usage to go up.
serviced restore failed on a large system.
Cannot use mariadb-model by name in CLI commands.
Warn/Show Error when authorization fails due to clock drifts between hosts.
Internal MetricConsume maxClientWaitTime and perClientMaxBacklogSize should have defaults changed.
Frequent error in serviced log: "ControlCenter.GetRunningServices timedout waiting for reply"
"Serviced unable to get memory metrics" message should not be present.
Logging turned on by debug does not turn off again.
Services never show the over-commitment red dot.
Concurrent map read and map write error kills serviced during WAN outage.
All services change their status to "starting" and the UI shows all in blue.
services endpoint returns MonitoringProfile data for top-level services.
Registration of host keys in the UI reports success even when it is not successful.
Insecure Cipher RC4 is enabled on 1.2.x.
Assigning same IP to the same service in a different pool causes an error.
Services are unstable and randomly terminated and restarted.
Upgraded delegate version information is wrong after authenticating.
Filebeat does not release pointers of deleted files causing container to run out of disk space.
Loading services page causes JS errors.
Unable to add collector to when NAT is involved.
Elastic is being locked up for the duration of a backup.
Edits to service config files are not always saved.
